name: PseudoTV Min
short_description:
-|- About -|-

This project is based from PseudoTV Live [1] done up nicely by Lunatixz which was based from Jason's original PseudoTV [2].

PseudoTV Min is essentially PseudoTV Live minus the Live bits, extra plugins, BCTs, and most other features. It's Lite.

-|- Install -|-

To install, download the repository and install the zip in Kodi. After that, go system > add-on's > get new > select this repository > program add-on's > and there you should see PseudoTV Min.

The configuration can be completely automated with AutoTune (recommended for first run) and further customized via the built in configuration menu.

-|- Links -|-

  - Kodi: https://kodi.tv/download/
  - PseudoTV Min zips: https://svn.code.sf.net/p/pseudotv-lite/svn/zips/script.pseudotv.lite/


-|- Sources -|-

  [1] - PseudoTV Live: https://github.com/Lunatixz/script.pseudotv.live
  [2] - PseudoTV: https://github.com/Jasonra/XBMC-PseudoTV
summary: Minimalistic fork of the PseudoTV Live add-on for Kodi
